description: Michael Grant is an exchange student from New York, currently staying at Miki`s house. He is in love with Miki eversince they first met, and intends to steal her from Yuu. He doesn`t like Kei very much and feels uncomfortable around him because Kei wants to steal Miki from Yuu while Yuu was studying in New York, like himself. He doesn`t bothers Miki when she`s upset or crying in her room, though he once climbed to her window like Yuu did.
name: Michael Grant
